attributes.action: allow people to be able to choose what vehicle they choose to drive, irrespective of how many of its wheels are driven and how large it is
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should the people of the United Kingdom be harassed into driving vehicles that outspoken and generally poorly informed campaigners deem to choose as being appropriate.  4x4 vehicles are usually more expensive than more "conventional" vehicles and therefore attract more VAT upon purchase and if they are less economical than other vehicles then the owners / drivers of such vehicles will pay more in duty to the Government.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/4x4owners/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
